titleStmt.title: Pasquils palinodia, and his progresse to the tauerne where after the suruey of the sellar, you are presented with a pleasant pynte of poeticall sherry.
titleStmt.author: Pasquil.
Fennor, William, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 19454 on UMI microfilm reel 969.
Reproductions of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Appears at reel 969 and at reel 1755 (same copy filmed twice).
